title: opinions on transport....?
content:
am a new typophile and what an awesome resource.

i found the place while researching transport (kinneir/calvert) and this leads me to the crux of this post; tranport...discuss. any opinions, reactions, quirky info (ie. something that wouldn't be on wiki!), useful links, sightings other than uk road signage....

very much appreciated

personally i find it functional. obvious perhaps, but its seeming lack of versatility (maybe as a result of its original use which casts a somewhat domineering shadow (?)) make this a de facto conclusion.
author: trickyred27

comments.content:
[Signage](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064138/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20signage) has been a hot topic here for many years.  
 [Wayfinding](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064138/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+wayfinding&btnG=Search) has been a hot topic here for many years.  
 [Road Signs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064138/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+road+sign&btnG=Search) have been a hot topic here for many years.

Welcome to Typophile!
